data.text: @LindseyGrahamSC @realDonaldTrump Trump lied to the Iranians and promised them help in various statements and told them to go and occupy the government buildings: help is on the way or if the Iranian regime shoots the protesters, we will shoot them, but in the end he went to negotiate with Khamenei with . #TACO

@LindseyGrahamSC @realDonaldTrump Dear president @realDonaldTrump @POTUS you promised #Iran help is on the way but seems Islamic regime has more power. Please #R2PforIran huge #IranMassacre #KingRezaPahlavi

@LindseyGrahamSC @realDonaldTrump With thanks to President Trump, Senator Lindsey Graham, Ted Cruz, and Marco Rubio, I ask you to eliminate the terrorist Khamenei regime and the terrorist Revolutionary Guards in Iran.
@LindseyGrahamSC @realDonaldTrump I hope you loose your job. We don’t need warmongers in congress.
@LindseyGrahamSC @realDonaldTrump You’re “being wiped out” because you refuse to enact anything substantial from Trump’s agenda. You’re all spineless, backstabbing cowards.
